body.name: Gadhra Commercial Mop, Looped-End String Industrial Mop, Heavy Duty Mops with 2 String Mop Heads for Floor Cleaning, Blue/Yellow

features: HEAVY COMMERCIAL INDUSTRIAL HOME DUST MOP - The overall length of this cotton wet mop is 63.7 inches. Set includes 2 enlarged mop head.Compared with ordinary mop,this mop is a large size, and cleans faster.It is a perfect choice for commercial, industrial or residential floor cleaning.

MIXED MATERIAL MOP HEAD - Our industrial mop head designed with premium quality microfiber hybrid cotton material,which has super water absorption,wet and dry dual use.It can easily remove the dirt on the floor and absorb the water stains on the floor surface.The fixed Yarn tail strap prevent the mop head from getting tangle and reduce fraying.

STAINLESS STEEL LONG HANDLE DESIGN - The handle of the industrial mop is made of thickened stainless steel, rust-proof, wear-resistant, non-slip, sturdy and durable.The pole has 3 sections in total, and the sections are connected and fixed with high-quality thickened PP tubes.Total length 63.7 inches, rod length 43.3 inches,Allow you to clean upright, reducing the strain on your waist.

STURDY MOP THAT IS EASY TO DISASSEMBLE - Compared with traditional linked mops, our string mop adopts the newly upgraded claw clamp, which can hold the mop head firmly, makes connection more stable and makes removing and efficiently.

APPLICABLE TO MULTIPLE SCENARIOS - This Larger cleaning mop head designed to cover larger areas while cleaning, reducing cleaning time. So this mop suitable all types of surface such as home wooden floors, office, workshop, warehouse and garage so on.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clamp Design Clamp design is stable and durable, it can firmly hold the mop head and easily replace. Save Space The end of the mop has hanging holes, it can hang on the wall and save your storage. Stainless Steel Handle The commercial mop handles are made of high-quality stainless steels, are durable to use. Strong Absorbent Mop Head The industrial mop can absorb the dirty water and stains, quickly grab the dirt and dust on the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally! A mop done right!
reviews.reviewText: This mop has a handle you can screw together so you can take one pole part out to make it shorter. It's sturdy and light weight. I absolutely love that the part where you attach the mop head doesn't scrape on the floor as you mop! It uses the mop head that you fold in two and it's good quality. It even comes with two mop heads-one yellow and one blue. They are washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No handle and heads
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure if it came with a handle. Handle and heads r awesome

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mop I the best from which I used in the past

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice mop and easy to assemble! Light weight and easy to use. A little bit smaller than I expected but nice mop and value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great value and quality for the price! Worked well, very durable as well as a nice full mop! I loved having a second mop head included! The construction is excellent and I love the secure way the clamp was designe; it's strong and I won't be worried about it popping open during a cleaning, like I've experienced in the past, from different company's mops I've owned! Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The quality is Garbage
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure how the QC team in China thought it was acceptable to release a product to America who's design is so poor it's nearly unusable, but here it is.The compression fittings that hold the mop handle together are not strong enough to hold the handle sections together once it's being used. The handle disassembles during use whether you're mopping the floor or lifting the mop itself in and out of the mop bucket. I've already had to replace the mop handle with wooden one. The mop head itself seems to do the job, but the handle is ridiculous in craftsmanship and design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Plastic parts and handle is too short.
reviews.reviewText: The mop heads and pole are short of professional size. But over all it’s a mop and it will clean the floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite household gadget
reviews.reviewText: Money well spent. No more broken dollar tree mop sticks for me. Vibrant colors and ease to assemble. Lightweight won't strain your back. Gonna order another set
